Bloomberg Business News
July 4, 2082
7:42 PM

Lunar Market Opens For Business

The IPOs were presented as follows:

Wal-Mark Comestibles: 1,000,000 shares at a cost of 280g/share/nShell-Beignet Dust: 5,000,000 shares at a cost of 300g/share/nEverline-ilk Financial: 8,000,000 shares at a cost of 330g/share
